prj02

Class HuffmanCoding

  • java.lang.Object
    • prj02.HuffmanCoding

  • public class HuffmanCoding
extends java.lang.Object
    The Huffman Encoding Algorithm This is a data compression algorithm designed by David A. Huffman and published in 1952 What it does is it takes a string and by constructing a special binary tree with the frequencies of each character. This tree generates special prefix codes that make the size of each string encoded a lot smaller, thus saving space.
    Since:
    10/16/2021
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Fernando J. Bermudez Medina (Template), A. ElSaid (Review), Carlos A. Leyva Capote 802204825 (Implementation)

        public static java.lang.String load_data(java.lang.String inputFile)
        Receives a file named in parameter inputFile (including its path), and returns a single string with the contents.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - name of the file to be processed in the path inputData/
        Returns:
        String with the information to be processed

      • compute_fd

        public static HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> compute_fd(java.lang.String inputString)
        Receives a string and returns a Map with the computed symbol frequency distribution of each character inside the input string.
        Parameters:
        inputString - string for which the symbol frequency distribution map will be computed
        Returns:
        Map whose key is a character converted to a string appearing in the input string and whose value is the amount of times it appears in that string

      • huffman_tree

        public static Tree.BTNode<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> huffman_tree(HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> fD)
        Receives a Map with the frequency distribution and returns the root node of the constructed Huffman tree.
        Parameters:
        fD - Map whose key is a character converted to a string appearing in the input string and whose value is the amount of times it appears in that string
        Returns:
        BTNode root node of the corresponding Huffman tree whose key is the frequency and the value is its corresponding symbol of type string

      • huffman_code

        public static HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> huffman_code(Tree.BTNode<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> huffmanRoot)
        Receives the root of a Huffman tree and returns a mapping of every symbol to its corresponding Huffman code.
        Parameters:
        huffmanRoot - BTNode root node of the corresponding Huffman tree whose key is the frequency and the value is its corresponding symbol of type string
        Returns:
        Map whose key is a character string to be encoded and its value is its Huffman code

      • encode

        public static java.lang.String encode(HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> encodingMap,
                                      java.lang.String inputString)
        Receives the Huffman code map and the input string and returns the encoded string.
        Parameters:
        encodingMap - Map whose key is a character string to be encoded and its value is its Huffman code
        inputString - String to be encoded
        Returns:
        String inputString encoded using Huffman lookup table

      • process_results

        public static void process_results(HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> fD,
                                   HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> encodedHuffman,
                                   java.lang.String inputData,
                                   java.lang.String output)
        Receives the frequency distribution map, the Huffman Prefix Code HashTable, the input string, and the output string, and prints the results to the screen (per specifications). Output Includes: symbol, frequency and code. Also includes how many bits has the original and encoded string, plus how much space was saved using this encoding algorithm
        Parameters:
        fD - Frequency Distribution of all the characters in input string
        encodedHuffman - Prefix Code Map
        inputData - text string from the input file
        output - processed encoded string

      • huffman_code

        public static HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> huffman_code(Tree.BTNode<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> huffmanNode,
                                                                            HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> huffmanEncoding,
                                                                            java.lang.String huffmanCode)
        Overloaded auxiliary method for huffman_code that receives the root of a Huffman tree and returns a mapping of every symbol to its corresponding Huffman code.
        Parameters:
        huffmanNode - BTNode node of the corresponding Huffman tree whose key is the frequency and the value is its corresponding symbol of type string
        huffmanEncoding - Map current state of the huffman encoding look up table to be returned
        huffmanCode - huffman code generated for current node (huffmanNode)
        Returns:
        Map final encoding look up table whose key is a character string to be encoded and its value is its Huffman code

      • decodeHuff

        public static java.lang.String decodeHuff(java.lang.String output,
                                          HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> lookupTable)
        Auxiliary Method that decodes the generated string by the Huffman Coding Algorithm. Used for output Purposes
        Parameters:
        output - - Encoded String
        lookupTable -
        Returns:
        The decoded String, this should be the original input string parsed from the input file
